medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient, a 30-year-old Indian male, had been told he was deficient in vitamin D in the past but had not been treated. Repeat testing confirmed vitamin D deficiency with an appropriate secondary rise in serum parathyroid hormone levels. He opted for self-treatment over a duration of 3 months, consuming UVB-irradiated mushrooms daily. Despite the winter season in England, he reported no changes in diet or lifestyle during this time.
medical_history.social_history: The patient follows a purely vegetarian diet for religious reasons, but does consume dairy products. He did not leave the UK during the treatment period.
